title: Second Sight
description: Have you ever wished you could see things before they happen? Have you ever thought about if you knew what numbers were going to hit on the lottery, would you pick those numbers? Kerrie Jenkins is an editor and is very successful. She is also the niece of a police detective. She sees his murder before it happens and tries to stop it. In the process she finds out that her aunt is an informant of the man whom is trying to kill her uncle and is caught between the right hand man of the villain whom has fallen in love with her and her love for the police detective whom is a family friend and whom is trying to protect her. This is a psychic/ romance novel that will keep you on the edge of your seat and guessing what will happen next. .
author: D.L.   Taylor
